Name: Magna Metals Incorporated
Description: Magna Metals HQ is based in Lopez on the Free World League and it has a subsidiary branch located in Taurus. The corporation is notable for manufacturing power plants both for Marik and the Taurian Concordat. The corporate branch on Lopez is dedicated to the manufacture of weapons.
ReputationStatements: Our records show you to be capable of performing this mission. Assuming that the negotiation phase goes on smoothly, of course.

MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. Well negotiated and performed to the spirit and wording as contracted.
